Summary: Three bright lights not moving in triangle formation, then vanished right in front of my eyes
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Longmont
There were 3 other sightings in Longmont on or around November 11th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving northbound on I 25 near hwy 66 30+miles north of Denver, CO. It was roughly 6:00pm when I noticed three lights north west that were staying still an in a large triangle formation. The light that was emitted was very overwhelming, for refrence it was as if there were 3 stars in our atmosphere. I pulled over to watch these, due to how strange in nature they were. There was no sign that they were air planes and also were way to high in the air to be helicoptors. As I sat there watching the objects, the one that appeared to be closer in distance vanished followed by the one to its right. The third light started to fade then bloomed into two lights stacked on top of each other. Then disappeared. I have never seen anything like this before, I live in the country and see lights in the sky all the time but this caught my attention there was something diffrent about these.
